# Familiar Refuge (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Teleportation Spells|teleportation]])

**Level:** [[6th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 6]], [[6th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 12th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 12]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Unlimited

**Target:** You or your familiar

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Complete Mage (WotC), pg. 104

*You feel the bond between yourself and your familiar strengthen, and then the animal stands before you.*

You instantly transport yourself to your familiar, or your familiar to you, as *[[Teleport, Greater (Spell)|greater teleport.]]* You can't bring any other living creatures with you.
